climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Soft and Skin-Friendly Material: This gray edge pillow is made from highly soft and skin-friendly fabric, providing a warm and indulgent touch. Its delicate texture offers a level of comfort that feels like it's personalized for you.

Environmentally Friendly Certification: Our product is designed with a strong commitment to environmental responsibility and holds an environmental-friendly certification. The manufacturing process employs sustainable materials and production techniques to minimize its impact on the environment. By choosing this pillow, you're not only ensuring your own comfort but also contributing to the future of our planet.

Exceptional Support: This gray edge pillow is engineered to provide exceptional support. Whether you sleep on your side, back, or stomach, it ensures optimal support for your neck and head, maintaining the right sleeping posture and alleviating tension and discomfort in your neck and shoulders.

Outstanding Breathability: The pillow's outstanding breathability ensures that air circulates freely, effectively regulating temperature, and keeping you cool and dry throughout the night. This not only prevents excessive sweating but also guarantees a comfortable night's sleep.

Premium Filling Material and High-End Quality: We use premium filling material to ensure the pillow's loftiness and comfort withstand the test of time. This pillow represents high-end quality, providing you with enduring comfort and support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Will our pillows be what you are looking for? Our pillows offer a range of unique benefits, including high quality materials, excellent comfort and support, and environmental certification. We are focused on providing you with a high quality sleep experience and our products have been carefully designed and manufactured to ensure you enjoy the best comfort and support. Buying one of our pillows will not only improve the quality of your sleep, but also provide a positive support for the future of the planet.

HOW TO USE Unseal the Outer Packaging: Unseal the outer packaging, which is usually a transparent or plastic covering wrapped around the pillow. Ensure it is fully unsealed to allow the pillow to expand freely.Wait Time: Place the pillow at room temperature and allow it to expand naturally. Typically, it takes 48 to 72 hours for the pillow to fully regain its original shape.Gently Pat or Fluff: During the waiting period, you can gently pat or fluff the pillow to help expedite the expansion process.Check Before Use: Once the pillow has fully expanded, ensure that its shape and comfort meet your expectations. If necessary, you can adjust the pillow's shape and thickness to accommodate your individual sleep preferences. Please note that activating a compressed packaged pillow takes some time for it to fully expand, so it's advisable to prepare in advance to ensure you can enjoy the best sleep experience when needed.

HOW TO USE Unseal the Outer Packaging: Unseal the outer packaging, which is usually a transparent or plastic covering wrapped around the pillow. Ensure it is fully unsealed to allow the pillow to expand freely.Wait Time: Place the pillow at room temperature and allow it to expand naturally. Typically, it takes 48 to 72 hours for the pillow to fully regain its original shape.Gently Pat or Fluff: During the waiting period, you can gently pat or fluff the pillow to help expedite the expansion process.Check Before Use: Once the pillow has fully expanded, ensure that its shape and comfort meet your expectations. If necessary, you can adjust the pillow's shape and thickness to accommodate your individual sleep preferences. Please note that activating a compressed packaged pillow takes some time for it to fully expand, so it's advisable to prepare in advance to ensure you can enjoy the best sleep experience when needed.

Soft, skin-friendly material The outer layer of this pillow is soft and skin-friendly for extreme comfort. Its fabric is delicate and skin-friendly, making you feel warm and pampered with every touch. Whether you're sensitive to comfort or looking for the ultimate in comfort, this soft, skin-friendly outer layer will add a cozy layer to your sleep experience. Selection of high quality fillings The pillow features a carefully selected filling to ensure the ideal comfort and support. Each filler is finely manufactured to provide the perfect balance of softness and elasticity, supporting the head and neck while adapting to the contours of the body. Whether you prefer soft or firm support, this pillow will meet your needs. The filling is durable and holds its shape, ensuring quality sleep and support in the long term. Machine washable The material design of this pillow is very thoughtful, and it can be easily washed. If you want to keep your pillow fresh, simply put it in the washing machine and use a gentle cleaning procedure to clean it easily. You can then air dry it or dry it in a low temperature dryer. This convenient washable design not only keeps the pillow hygienic, but also extends its service life, ensuring that you always enjoy a fresh and hygienic sleep experience.
Let you lie on the clouds, let sleep be a pleasure.

The design of this pillow caters to different sleeping positions, making it suitable for various preferences. Whether you prefer sleeping on your back, side, or stomach, this pillow provides ideal support and comfort. For back sleepers, it offers even head support, helping to maintain the natural curvature of the neck and spine. Side sleepers will find that the pillow fills the gap between the neck and shoulders, ensuring proper alignment and relieving pressure points. Even for stomach sleepers, it provides soft support to ensure the neck isn't excessively twisted. This means that, regardless of your sleeping position, you can enjoy the comfort and support this pillow offers, ensuring a high-quality sleep experience.

reviews.reviewText: Seems like good quality for the price. Haven't started to breakdown and flatten out after a few weeks of use like most pillows

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, firmer than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 pillows from this merchant.They arrived on time and well packaged. Vacuum sealed. Sealed separately at that..In fact, they were so well packaged, I could have chosen to just use one and put the other away for some time in the future.My first impression was how soft the material was, both front and back. The stitching was excellent. I saw no missing stitches, pulled thread or any areas that the front and back were not tightly sewn.The lack of any odor was nice! Sometimes , unfortunately, I have received items that were vacuumed sealed, only to find they sealed in the awful order of the product.Not so in this case. Here are MY Pros;The price. I bought 2 pillows and paid less than I would have paid for just 1 pillow of lesser quality elsewhere.Softness-The material was super soft to touch.QualityExcellent quality. It supported my head the same amount regardless of where I lay my head.Con’s.The only con I have , with these pillow’s, is that they are a bit too firm for my particular needs and comfort.I have osteoarthritis of my spine so I need my pillow’s to be more on the “saggy” side.I gave them to my adult children, a male and female. They both thought they were very comfortable.I how this helps !
